extendedInfo.description: Over 7,000,000 Downloads Worldwide!Ranked #1 in both Japan and North America!Dark Summoner, One of the Most Popular Fantasy Adventure Games on smartphone!Monster Designs by Many Famous Artists!* This game will run on Android 2.2 and higher, but some display issues may arise on devices running other OS versions.Dark Summoner, the High-Quality Online Game That'sGarnering Attention from Around the World!Join the Globally Acclaimed Dark Fantasy!â¼Campaign Informationâ¼Welcome Back Campaign Underway!Any Player That Returns to Dark Summoner After an Absence of30 or More Days Will Receive a Gift.The Monsters Await Your Return!***********************************************************ãGame IntroductionãBring about an end to the war that's plunged the world into chaos!Summon powerful Rare Monsters and power them up to be mighty warriors for your cause.Form Clans with your friends and aim for the top rank!â  Featuring artwork by many famous Japanese and international artists!A large number of artists from Japan and other countries have contributed to the game.Gorgeous illustrations and intense CG movies deepen the game experience.â  More than 1,200 monster types!Featuring more than 1,200 types of monsters designed by famous artists!Monsters are frequently added! Get them all to complete your collection!â  Power up your monsters!Make sacrifices to the monsters you've collected to create the strongest team.Raise epic monsters and become the best!â  Team up with friends to defeat legendary Dark Lord Raid Bosses!Summon legendary Dark Lords using items gathered from completing missions.Cooperate with friends to defeat the Dark Lords and their unbelievable power!Defeated Dark Lords will join your team!â  Form Clans with your friends!Create and develop Clans with your friends to gain bonuses!Battle against your Clan mates in future in-game events!Secure your spot in history alongside your friends!â  Only have a few minutes free? That's OK!The game is playable even if you only have a few minutes to spare.Play at your own pace -- on the train to work or school, before bed, whatever fits your lifestyle!â  New free events and updates added monthly!New events and content are added to the game each month.Dark Summoner is constantly evolving!***********************************************************â» Read through the End-User License Agreement before playing the game.http://www.darksummoner.com/agreement.htmlâ» The game's initial load time may take a few minutes in areas with a weak network connection.In such cases, please wait for the load to complete and do not close the application.â» A Wi-Fi connection is recommended for the optimal Dark Summoner experience.â» The game may not run smoothly in certain conditions.This can sometimes be improved by restarting the application or rebooting your device.We apologize for the inconvenience. Thank you for your patience while we work on improving this.

reviews.title: The Best battle game around!!
reviews.comment: Excellent game! New events all the time with great rewards. Use my player ID when starting the game and get ahead with free gifts! Guild: Sin \343\200\200Player ID: 1868900843  When you start the game and input the Player ID above, you will receive 3 Ally Invite Summons.
reviews.author: Irmon Tippy

reviews.title: Addictive and fun
reviews.comment: Very fun to play. Use my ID 1690666021 for free monster summons
reviews.author: paulphantom

reviews.title: Dark Summoner TRY IT Now
reviews.comment: My Player ID. 2597687185.........TRY this game.  I play every day. Please please try it once.  I need one to summons the ones waiting.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lost it all
reviews.comment: This game is great until it loses your game data and have to start out with nothing considering there\'s no possible way to contact these people. Don\'t spend real money, it\'ll be gone.
reviews.author: David Romas

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: A great game to kill time. Not much I would change about it. They constantly update and make it better. Enter my ID 1423306071 when you start and you will receive 3 ally summons and other bonuses to help get you started. If you add me as your ally you\'ll also get 5 skill points and I gift/trade often with all my active allies.
reviews.author: Kenneth Heefner

reviews.title: Fun. Use my ID for prizes :)
reviews.comment: Come and join this addictive game. Here use my ID, Guild : Ranchor. ID : 1646161148. Use it at beginning for beginners to get free monster summon after you choose your guild. You can also add me as your ally. Since i\'m new here, let\'s guide each other. Have fun :)
reviews.author: Din Radhi

reviews.title: SINsation
reviews.comment: Game ruined by recent greedy changes from ateam dev team. Won\'t spend another dime! Was once the best, now terrible due to ateam greed with recent unfriendly player changes. The developers of this, (once a fantastic game), are becoming too greedy and taking away all player freedom, forcing most to either pay to keep up or quit, I guess millions,(31M+), just wasn\'t enough for ateam. Beware of this game and the upcoming Dark Rebirth!  I will not buy Sp! Ateam, Give back  prog trading & gifting capabilities!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: LOVE this game!
reviews.comment: I actually have two accounts, so add me on both: ID: 2799255531 ID: 1511436732 . When you start and add me I\'ll give you powerful cards from A+ to AA+ (: something to get you started. (:
reviews.author: Reyna Liebknecht

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: I really like this game. Im playing all the time. Its addicting and difficult.The ability to trade with other players takes this game to another level. If you are up for something challenging try this game. You dont have to use real money, but it makes you want to. Be sure to enter my code you will want the free \"summons\" Have fun ;-)   Guild: Sin \343\200\200Player ID: 2458440118  When you start the game and input the Player ID above, you will receive Ally Invite Summonx3.

reviews.title: .Love this game...

reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sacrificing
reviews.comment: I have a good suggestion. When Sacrificing you should have the option to sort by skill, rarity or type. It would help when you have a bunch of monsters and youre looking for one specific skill or monster. It would be more efficient and productive than having to flip from page to page...in my opinion.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Great game, always stuff to do.   When you start the game and input the Player ID: 1703240567  you and I will receive 3  monster summons. More than the only 1 without entering that id :-)
reviews.author: Sten Schleicher

reviews.title: Crashing all the time
reviews.comment: Ur apps recently in 4 past days always crashed. Try to uninstall it but it doesn\'t work. Keep coming back to title screen please fix it asap as i want to play it.

reviews.comment: Diggin this App...want to be apart of a GLOBALY PLAYED and INCREDIBLY ADDICTING GAME? THEN GET THIS APP AND GET IN IT WITH US!! NEW UPDATE TO BLOW YOUR MIND...PLAY IT..LOVE IT!!!

reviews.comment: I used to love this game. This was all I did all day long. But now I can\'t even log on. What happened guys? - PhoenixZZ

reviews.title: Addicting and fun
reviews.comment: I love this game it is very addicting and fun to play. Special events all the time, free gifts and rankings. New monsters added almost weekly and a very big awesome community!
reviews.author: Gary Kapostas
